rdf:Description.dc:title: Alberta's energy reserves ... and supply/demand outlook 2005
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta Energy and Utilities Board.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Calgary : Alberta Energy and Utilities Board,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Outlook covers the 10-year period following the date of the report; e.g. Alberta's energy reserves 2005 and supply/demand outlook 2006/2015.
Series chronological designation is based on date of publication and is not to be confused with date of report; e.g. series designation for 2005 report is ST98-2006.
Issued as text report supplemented with Designated fields (oil and gas) and oil sands areas [map] and Basic reserves data tables [compact disc].
System requirements for online access: Adobe Acrobat.
Alberta Government Library*2011 copy 2 is missing map.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Petroleum reserves
Natural gas reserves
Sulfur industry
Oil sands industry
rdf:Description.dc:relation: Text report also available in online version.
